pageContent:
Mitesh Champaneri
Business Analyst
Summary:
Passionate and value-driven IT professional with over 13 years of progressive experience within 
various segments of IT - Business/Systems/Quality/Data Analysis, Project Management, Business 
Partnerships, and Client Services Management
Expertise  in  SDLC  and  Agile/Scrum  methodologies;  producing  high-quality  deliverables  within 
timeline and budgetary targets
Experience creating and modifying custom reports using Crystal Reports, SQL Server Reporting 
Services, Microsoft Access and Excel
Experienced  with  HIPAA  Compliance  requirements  and  excellent  knowledge  of  EDI  X12 
(270/271, 276/277, 834, 835, 837, 999, 277, MAO-002, MAO-001, and MAO-004) transactions
Knowledge  of  Medicaid/  Medicare,  Dual  Eligible  and  Special  Needs  Plans  (MLTC  and  FIDA), 
Medicare  Advantage,  Medicare  plans:  Enrollment/Disenrollment,  Reconciliation,  Compliance, 
Hospital, and Professional Claims, Grievance and Appeals process

Medicare  Advantage,  Medicare  plans:  Enrollment/Disenrollment,  Reconciliation,  Compliance, 
Hospital, and Professional Claims, Grievance and Appeals process
Sound  knowledge  of  project  management  methodologies  and  practices,  and  concepts  contained 
within the Project Management Body of Knowledge (PMBOK)
Working  knowledge  of  Enterprise  Resources  Planning  (ERP)  systems;  business  principals, 
business workflows and various department functions
Proficient in Medicaid, Medicare (A, B, C, D), Procedural & Diagnostic codes, & Claims Process.
Extensive experience in organizing and facilitating JAD sessions, interviews & workshops. 
Highly experienced in requirement analysis, designing process modeling (UML) using Use Cases, 
Sequence  Diagrams,  and  Collaboration  diagrams,  Activity  Diagrams,  Class  Diagrams  and  Data 
Modeling.
Knowledge of Prototype, Wireframes, Storyboards, and User/Process flows & Site maps.

Sequence  Diagrams,  and  Collaboration  diagrams,  Activity  Diagrams,  Class  Diagrams  and  Data 
Modeling.
Knowledge of Prototype, Wireframes, Storyboards, and User/Process flows & Site maps.
Developed   BRD,   FRD   &   SRS   with   detailed   knowledge   of   functional   &   nonfunctional 
requirements.
Experienced in creating Use Cases, Requirement gatherings, Request for Proposal (RPF), 
Use Case Diagrams, Business Flow Diagrams, Activity diagrams, and Sequence diagrams 
using RUP methodology & UML modeling tools using MS Visio & Rational Rose.
Compliance Implementation and Enterprise Modeling.
Clear understanding of concepts such as Data Warehouse, Data Mining, and ETL. 
Extensive knowledge in Data Mapping, Data Modeling, Star/Snowflake Schemas
Experienced in UAT and developing Test Documents, Test Plans, Test Cases, & Test Scripts
Involved in maintaining Test Matrix, Traceability Matrix, and implementing Unit Testing.

Experienced in UAT and developing Test Documents, Test Plans, Test Cases, & Test Scripts
Involved in maintaining Test Matrix, Traceability Matrix, and implementing Unit Testing.
Ability to manage workload within time sensitive deadlines, handle multiple projects or tasks.
Strong analytical, written, communication, presentation & problem-solving skills with the ability 
to present solutions that address requirements and mitigate risk; good interpersonal and team player 
skills.
Education:
Bachelor’s in Computer Engineering, Gujarat University in 2009
Work Authorization:
US Citizen
